    Intent for file transfer invitation
    Author:

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_NEW_INVITATION

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_NEW_INVITATION
        Broadcast action: a new file transfer has been received.

        Intent includes the following extras:

        • EXTRA_CONTACT containing the MSISDN of the contact sending the invitation.
        • EXTRA_DISPLAY_NAME containing the display name of the contact sending the invitation (extracted from the SIP address).
        • EXTRA_TRANSFER_ID containing the unique ID of the file transfer.
        • EXTRA_FILENAME containing the filename of file to be transferred.
        • EXTRA_FILESIZE containing the size of the file to be transferred.
        • EXTRA_FILETYPE containing the MIME type of the file to be transferred.
        • EXTRA_FILEICON containing the URI of the file icon associated to the file to be transferred.
        • EXTRA_CHAT_ID containing the chat ID of the associated group chat. .
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_CHAT_ID

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_CHAT_ID
        Chat ID in case of file transfer during a group chat. Otherwise there it is null.
